label: ShippingMarks
comment: Physical markings or labels on individual packages or transport units for logistics purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a marking instruction for these logistics shipping marks.
Marking, expressed as text, for these logistics shipping marks.

objectProperties.comment: A barcode label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
A Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
Radioactive labelling that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
A Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.

referencedBy.comment: Physical logistics shipping marks and barcode information for this referenced supply chain consignment item.
Physical logistics shipping marks and barcode information for this referenced supply chain consignment item.
Physical logistics shipping marks and barcode information for this referenced supply chain consignment item.
